info.author: Globo.com
info.description:
README
======

A python library to send application metrics using UDP.

.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/globocom/measure.svg?branch=master
   :target: https://travis-ci.org/globocom/measure
   :alt: Build Status

How do I get set up?
--------------------

* Summary of set up
	
.. code-block:: bash

	mkvirtualenv measure
	pip install -r test_requirements.txt

* Usage

.. code-block:: python

	from measure import Measure
	measure = Measure('myclient', ('localhost', 1984))
	measure.count('mymetric', dimensions={'name': 'john'})

* How to run tests

.. code-block:: bash

	make tests

Contribution guidelines
-----------------------

* Write tests
* Code review
* Make a pull request :-)

Who do I talk to?
-----------------

* File an issue at https://github.com/globocom/measure or contact us at
  busca@corp.globo.com
info.name: measures
info.summary: Library for posting metrics to a server
